resources.string: If enabled the screen refresh rate is tried to be changed to match video fps.
Force VSync on refresh rate change
If enabled the render mode will be forced to VSync. Usually this is not needed and could even cause audio/video drifting.
Exclude list of refresh rates from changes. Enter values as integers separated by commas (i.e. 23,25,50).
Override the default mappings. Format: fps:Hz; fps:Hz (i.e. "23:24": for video fps=23.976 change screen refresh rate to 24Hz).
